entry.title: Welch Allyn DuraShock DS45 Pocket Aneroid Sphygmomanometer
entry.summary:
Vendor: Welch Allyn
Type: Aneroid Sphygmomanometer
Price: 72.88

The Welch Allyn DuraShock DS45 Pocket Aneroid Sphygmomanometer is a non-invasive blood pressure measurement device that is intended for use in conjunction with an inflatable cuff and stethoscope to determine blood pressure in pediatric through adult patients.

Warranty: 10 Years.

The Welch Allyn DuraShock DS45 Pocket Aneroid Sphygmomanometer features a unique integrated, cuff-mounted design that is compact and lightweight for ease of use. The gauge rotates 360° for easy viewing from any angle. A bumper around the dial provides added protection and a large inflation bulb and high-quality air-release valve make inflation easy.


Welch Allyn DuraShock DS45 Pocket Aneroid Sphygmomanometer Features

  • Gauge rotates 360° for easy viewing from any angle.
  • Laser-engraved dial face for accuracy.
  • Certified accuracy to +/- 3 mmHg.
  • Withstands a 30" drop, AAMI's standard shock resistant requirement.
  • Gauge snaps directly into cuff quick cuff changes.
  • Gear-free DuraShock technology.

Welch Allyn DuraShock DS45 Pocket Aneroid Sphygmomanometer Specifications

  • Accuracy: +/- 3 mm Hg.
  • Operational Range: 0 to 300 mmHg.
  • Displayed Range: 0 to 300 mmHg.
  • Indication Type: Radial Scale.
  • Scale Graduation: Increments of 2mmHg.
  • Pointer Movement: No stop pin.
  • Tube Adapter: Integrated, 1 or 2 tube adapter.
  • Pressure Generation: Bulb.
  • Pressure Reduction: Air Release Valve.
  • Storage Temperature: -20°C to 70°C (-4°F to 158°F).
  • Storage Relative Humidity: 15% to 95% (non-condensing).
  • Operating Temperature: 10°C to 40°C (50°F to 104°F).
  • Operating Relative Humidity: 15% to 90% (non-condensing).

entry.title: Big-Digit Memory Traceable Thermometer
entry.summary:
Vendor: Cole Parmer
Type: memory thermometer
Price: 48.99

BIG-DIGIT THERMOMETER WITH DUAL MIN/MAX MEMORY AND HI/LO ALARMS

Easy-view, 1-1/8-inch-high jumbo digits may be read from 25 feet.

External probe range is –58.0 to 158.0°F/ –50.0 to 70.0°C. Ambient sensor (inside case) range is 23.0 to 122.0°F/–5.0 to 50.0°C. Resolution is 0.1° and accuracy is ±1°C. This stable and accurate unit requires no adjustment or maintenance. External (3/16-inch diameter by 4/5-inch length) probe is supplied with a 10-foot cable.

TRACEABLE® CERTIFICATE

Multi-point calibration on an individually-numbered Traceable® Certificate which assures accuracy from our ISO/IEC 17025:2017 (1750.01) calibration laboratory accredited by A2LA.  It indicates traceability of measurements to the SI units through NIST or other recognized national measurement institutes (NMI) that are signatories to the CIPM Mutual Recognition Agreement. Supplied: flip-open stand, wall mounting, hook and loop tape, Traceable® Certificate, and AAA battery. Case is high-impact, chemical-resistant ABS plastic. Size is 4 x 4-1/4 x 3/4 inches and weight is 4 ounces. Replacement battery Cat. No. 1105.


*Ships Free*

entry.title: Traceable 4096 Digital Humidity/Temperature Meter
entry.summary:
Vendor: Cole Parmer
Type: humidity/temperature monitor
Price: 72.88

Displays both relative humidity and temperature continuously and simultaneously with dual-recall memories, this digital meter is ideal for routine measurements, monitoring round-the-clock, quality-control needs, and critical experimental requirements.

Traceable 4096 Offers

Features

  • Ideal for routine measurements, monitoring round-the-clock, quality-control needs, and critical experimental requirements
  • Minimum and maximum memories can be displayed or cleared at any time with the touch of a key
  • Fulfills CLIA specification 493.1252 for monitoring temperature and humidity
  • Displays: MIN/MAX and current relative humidity, MIN/MAX and current temperature, and °F/°C switchable

Applications

Monitors around-the-clock the exact air conditions in labs, hoods, clean rooms, coolers, stockrooms, incubators, environmental chambers, and chemical storage areas.

entry.title: RCS-100 Medical Camera System
entry.summary:
Vendor: Riester
Type: Portable Imaging Device
Price: 300.86 - 1180.13 (4 variants)

Digital, portable and multifunctional medical camera system

With the RCS-100, Riester introduces a new generation of a digital medical camera system with a full range of lenses. RCS-100 is available with an otoscope, general and dermatoscope lens.

RCS-100 allows accurate first diagnosis and planning of consistent follow-up treatment.

General features

 

  • Dimensions: 225 mm x 135 mm x 45 mm (8.86 in x 5.31 in x 1.77 in)
  • Weight: 292 g (10.3 oz)
  • Power supply: rechargeable Li-ion battery
  • 5” full HD colour TFT-LCD display, including scratch proof cover 1.280x720 Pixel
  • Touch screen, very easy to use
  • Rotary wheel allows easy one-hand operation
  • 16 GB internal memory
  • 3.5 hours operating time in video mode
  • Bayonet connector for attachable optic modules for fast & easy change of lenses
  • Image and video function
  • Focus settings: automatic (otoscope/general lens), manual (all lenses)
  • RCS-100 user interface available in different languages: english, german, french, spanish, italian, russian, chinese, arabic)
  • New patient to be added via UI, info saved in name of picture / video file
  • Power adapter incl. country plugs (EU, US, UK, Australia)
  • Charging time: 3 hours

Imaging

  • 8 MPixel CMOS for high resolution and a scaleable image
  • Image format: JPEG
  • Video format: H.264
  • Resolution: Full HD true 3264 x 2448 Pixel

 

Connectivity

  • Micro USB 2.0, cable length min. 180cm
  • UVC function (to be activated via UI on camera) allows live picture display on 2nd screen in parallel
  • WiFi SD card (16GB) optionally available

 

Features of otoscope lens

  • Enhanced view of auditory canal
  • Magnification on display: 6x
  • 12mm Ø field of view at 25mm distance from viewing object (with 4mm specula size)
  • 9mm Ø field of view at 15mm distance from viewing object (with 4mm specula size)
  • 8mm Ø filed of view at 10mm distance from viewing object (with 4mm specula size)
  • Disposable and reusable specula mm (in): 2 (0.08), 3 (0.12), 4 (0.16), 5 (0.2)
  • Light source: visible white LED
  • LED colour temperature: 4000K
  • Focus range: 8-25 mm (0.31-0.98 in)
  • Resolution: 8 MP CMOS
  • Air channel for pneumatic test (compatible with existing Riester connector)
  • Dimensions: 73.5 mm x 40 mm x 40 mm (1.57 in x 1.57 in x 1.57 in)
  • Weight: 96g (3.40 oz)

Features of general lens

  • Light source: visible white LED
  • LED colour temperature: 5.500K
  • Focus range mm (in): 30-4000 mm (1.18 - 157.48 in)
  • Resolution: 8 MP CMOS
  • Display magnification at 30mm object distance: 1x-4x
  • Field of view: 78°
  • Optical magnification: 2x
  • Digital magnification: 4x
  • Dimensions: 60.5 mm x 60.5 mm x 19 mm (23.82 in x 23.82 in x 0.75 in)
  • Weight: 66.4g (2.34 oz)

 

Features of dermatoscope lens

  • Accurate identification and measurement of skin lesions
  • No immersion necessary
  • Light source: visible white LED
  • LED colour temperature: 4000K
  • Field of view: 30 mm Ø (1.18 in Ø)
  • Resolution: 8 MP CMOS
  • Digital movable ruler
  • Optical magnification: 2x (from optics)
  • Digital magnificaton: 4x (on top)
  • Displayed magnification: 2x - 8x
  • Dimensions: 62.1 mm x 62.1 mm x 36 mm (24.4 in x 24.4 in x 1.42 in)
  • Weight: 108.5 g (3.83 oz)

Ships directly from manufacture.

**Exclusive Show Pricing Valid Until November 30, 2019.

entry.title: RBP-100 Automatic Blood Pressure Monitor
entry.summary:
Vendor: Riester
Type: Blood Pressure Cuff Kit
Price: 357.14 - 434.67 (4 variants)

RBP-100: maximum flexibility in patient diagnostics

General features:

  • World class, clinical grade NIBP device
  • Light and practical blood pressure monitor for clinical use  
  • BP & pulse measurement range:
    Systolic: 60-255 mmHg
    Diastolic: 30-200mmHg
    MAP: 40-200 mmHg
    Heart rate: 40-200 bpm
  • BIHS validated technology
  • 4" LCD screen, easy to read
  • Oscillometric mode: Fast readings, typically 30 – 40 seconds
  • Auscultatory mode with auto-deflate (3 mmHg/sec) provides consistent patient BP measurement and allows clinicians to verify automated readings without removing the cuff
  • Average mode (3x) allows more objective measurement results for clinicians and helps to reduce elevated readings due to white-coat effect
    Interval settings possible in average mode: 15, 30, 45, 60 seconds
  • Arrythmia detection
  • Clinically validated for patients with special conditions: hypertension, hypotension, diabetes, pregnancy, pre-eclampsia, arteriosclerosis, end-stage renal disease, obesity, the elderly and for children > 3 years of age
  • Memory: capacity for 210 readings
  • Easy to use one touch operation
  • Display panel with WHO Blood Pressure Value Classification (colour coded)
  • Rechargeable internal battery pack (4x NIMH AA) allows 1000 measurements if fully charged
  • 6 hours needed for a full charge
  • Partial standy-by mode (shut-off of background illumination after 10 seconds)
  • Storage basket on the reverse side for desk, mobile and for wall-mount version. Additional optional basket can be attached to pole of mobile stand
  • Latex free cuffs included in standard delivery
    Adult cuff (Size M, 22-32cm / 8.67 - 12.6 inch)
    Large adult cuff (Size L+XL, 32-52cm / 12.6 - 20.48 inch)
    Optional: Child cuff (size S, 14-22cm / 5.52-8.67 inch )
  • Cleaning recommended via wipe disinfection with a medical grade mild disinfectant spray (i.e. Cidex, Enzol or 10% bleach solution)
  • 2-year warranty
  • Alternative power use via AC/DC adapter 7.5V/1.5A
  • Country-specific interchangeable socket plugs are included in standard delivery of each version
  • Total tube length 280 cm (110.24 in)
  • Weight: 510g (1.12 lb)
  • Ships directly from manufacturer. 

**Exclusive Show Pricing Valid Until November 30, 2019.

entry.title: Adscope 658 Electronic Stethoscope
entry.summary:
Vendor: ADC
Type: Stethoscope
Price: 224.99

With ADC’s Adscope 658 Electronic stethoscope, you’ll hear sounds you may have missed with a traditional acoustic instrument. The contact-activated microphone filters higher-frequency background noises that typically interfere with auscultation, then amplifies heart and lung sounds up to 18X.

  • Amplifies sounds up to 18X (24dB)
  • Noise-filtering contact microphone eliminates background interference
  • Eight-step volume control with last-setting memory
  • Cardiology headset with bilumen tubing and stainless-steel binaurals
  • Multifunction button controls the frequency mode (bell or diaphragm) and the volume (eight levels)
  • Backlit LCD display powers down automatically if not in use
  • Rechargeable Li-ion battery, twenty hours of continuous use on a full charge
  • High-impact thermoplastic housing withstands drops, bumps, and other contact
  • Measures 30 inches and weighs 175 grams
  • Contact microphone measures 7 mm in diameter, suitable for use on any size patient
  • Includes three pairs of Adsoft Plus snap-on silicone eartips, two small and one large
  • Micro USB cable and scope ID tag also included
  • Two-year warranty on electronics (chestpiece), lifetime warranty on headset

entry.title: Omron BP785 10 Series Upper Arm Blood Pressure Monitor, Black/white
entry.summary:
Vendor: Omron Healthcare, Inc.
Type: Automatic Blood Pressure Cuff
Price: 86.99

Omron 10 Series Upper Arm Blood Pressure Monitor with Bluetooth, Track 200 Reading On Smartphone, Advanced Accuracy. 

The Omron 10 Series plus Bluetooth Smart home blood pressure monitor has all the features of our 10 Series monitor and more. Now you can access your readings anywhere, anytime with our new Omron Wellness mobile and Website apps (learn more at www.omronwellness.com). That way it's easier for you to track your progress and take the right steps to manage your heart. 

Manage and track your last 200 readings on your smartphone, compatible with Apple iPhone 5, 5C, 5S; iOS 7+, Samsung Galaxy S III, Galaxy S 4; Android 4.3+.Comfortable and simple to adjust, the pre-formed ComFit Cuff inflates around the entire arm to avoid incorrect cuff positioning ensuring a precise reading and expandable cuff fits standard and large arms.
  • Omron blood pressure monitors are the #1 recommended brand by doctors and pharmacists for clinically-accurate home blood pressure monitoring, and the #1 selling manufacturer of blood pressure monitors for over 40
  • Two users can store and review last 100 readings each (total 200 readings) Receive unlimited readings by smartphone with Omron’s free app, available at App store or Google Play
  • Comfortable and adjustable pre-formed ComFit Cuff inflates around the entire arm to ensure correct cuff positioning and precise reading (fits standard and large arms)
  • Automatically displays the average of your last 3 readings taken within 10 minutes. Shows how readings compare to normal home blood pressure levels with easy-to-read, backlit screen with extra-large digits
  • Package includes: one blood pressure monitor, one wide-range cuff (fits arms 9 to 17 inches in circumference), quick start guide, instruction manual, AC adapter, and 4 AA batteries.

entry.title: BD Influenza A+B POC Kit, CLIA Waived, 30 tests/kit
entry.summary:
Vendor: Becton Dickinson
Type: Flu Test Kit
Price: 403.99

Test kits that enable the lab to provide a test result back to the clinician in a timely manner.

Rapid diagnostic testing plays a key role in clinical and hospital lab settings because it enables the lab to provide a test result back to the clinician in a timely manner.

These Flu A+B Test Kits for the Veritor Plus Analyzer can promptly deliver accurate, objective test results for clinical and hospital lab professionals. POC testing means that testing is performed at or near the site of patient care. The advancement in performance and objectivity in reading test results with the BD Veritor Plus system allows for timely decision making at the POC, accelerating diagnosis and helping ensure appropriate patient decisions and timely treatment.

Features

  • Enables the lab to provide a test result back to the clinician in a timely manner
  • Promptly delivers accurate, objective test results for clinical and hospital lab professionals
  • Testing is performed at or near the site of patient care
  • Helps ensure appropriate patient decisions and timely treatment

Specification

  • Application: Rapid Test Kit
  • CLIA Classification: CLIA Waived
  • For Use With: BD Veritor Plus Analyzer with BD Veritor InfoScan Module / BD Veritor Plus Analyzer / BD Veritor System
  • Reading Type: Machine Read
  • Sample Type: Nasal Swab / Nasopharyngeal Swab Sample
  • Test Format: Test Device
  • Test Name: Influenza A + B
  • Test Type: Immunochromatographic Assay
  • Time to Results: 10 Minute Results

30 test per kit

entry.summary:
Vendor: Welch Allyn
Type: Digital Thermometer
Price: 249.99

  • Innovative PerfecTemp technology adjusts for variability in probe placement
  • Designed to take quick and accurate readings, to improve patient satisfaction
  • Electronic security features help prevent theft, loss
  • ExacTemp technology detects stability of the probe during measurement
  • 60 second pulse timer assists with manual measurement of pulse rate, respiration

Product description

Product Description

The Welch Allyn Braun ThermoScan PRO 6000 Ear Thermometer features advanced measurement technology, delivering the speed and simplicity you need to capture accurate and reliable temperature readings in a comfortable way for patients. The Braun PRO 6000 advantage lies in our innovative PerfecTemp technology, which adjusts for factors, such as poor technique and probe placement, that may impact measurement accuracy. The sleek design is easy to disinfect and optional security features help protect and maximize your investment. Memory recall button and 60-second pulse timer are added features to support staff efficiency and help improve workflow.

entry.title: Memory Traceable Monitoring Thermometer
entry.summary:
Vendor: Control Company
Type: Vaccine Thermometer
Price: 64.25 - 68.75 (3 variants)

TRACEABLE® REFRIGERATOR/FREEZER THERMOMETER

The world's most popular refrigerator/freezer thermometer

  • Triple display simultaneously shows Min/max and current temperatures, °F/°C switchable
  • Accurately monitor temperatures in freezers, water baths, heating blocks, incubators, and refrigerators with this enclosed temperature-buffered sensor
  • Bottle insulates sensor from rapid temperature changes when refrigerator door is opened. Ten-foot micro-cable permits refrigerator doors to close on it.
  • Minimum/maximum monitors high and low readings overnight, on weekends, or for any time period
  • Alarm is programmable in 1° increments, sounds continuously when temperature rises above/falls below set points and can be turned off manually
  • High-impact, chemical-resistant ABS plastic case: 2¾ x 4¼ x ¾ inches, weight: 4 ounces

ACCURATE AND RELIABLE

Range is –58 to 158°F and –50 to 70°C with a resolution of 1° and accuracy of ±1°C.Ten-foot micro-cable permits refrigerator doors to close on it.

BOTTLE PROBE

Solid-state probe eliminates mercury contamination in refrigerators. Probe is sealed in a miniature bottle (1 x 2-1/2 inches) filled with nontoxic glycol. Solution is GRAS (generally recognized as safe) by the FDA (Food and Drug Administration). Eliminates concerns about contact with food or drinking water.

TRACEABLE® CERTIFICATE

Multi-point calibration on an individually-numbered Traceable® Certificate which assures accuracy from our ISO/IEC 17025:2005 (1750.01) calibration laboratory accredited by A2LA.  It indicates traceability of measurements to the SI units through NIST or other recognized national measurement institutes (NMI) that are signatories to the CIPM Mutual Recognition Agreement. Supplied: Traceable® Certificate, flip-open stand, wall mounting, Velcro®, and magnetic strips.

entry.title: Sofia Influenza A+B FIA Test Kit (25 Test)
entry.summary:
Vendor: Quidel
Type: Flu Test Kit
Price: 390.00

The Sofia Influenza A+B Fluorescent Immunoassay (FIA) uses advanced immunofluorescence-based lateral-flow technology to detect influenza A and influenza B viral nucleoprotein antigens.

Features and Benefits

  • CLIA waived for nasal and nasopharyngeal swabs, nasal aspirate and wash: Easy to perform testing
  • Compatible with RSV Extraction Reagent: A single sample can be used to run both Sofia Influenza A+B and Sofia RSV
  • Dual work modes: Adjusts to your volume fluctuations
  • Self-contained test cassette: Clean, easy to use and dispose of
  • Fixed-volume pipette: Collects and dispenses correct amount of sample needed for testing
  • Objective result: Eliminates the subjectivity of a visual result
  • Room temperature storage: No refrigerator space needed. Rapid influenza tests can be run immediately as needed

Materials Included

  • (25) Individually Packaged Test Cassettes:
  • (25) Reagent Tubes: Lyophilized buffer with detergents and reducing agents
  • (25) Reagent Solution: Ampoules with salt solution
  • (25) Sterile Nasal Swabs
  • (25) Small, Clear 120 µL Fixed Volume Pipettes
  • (25) Large, Pink 250 µL Fixed Volume Pipettes
  • (1) Influenza A and Influenza B Positive Control Swab: Swab is coated with non-infectious recombinant influenza A and influenza B antigens
  • (1) Negative Control Swab : Swab is coated with heat-inactivated, non-infectious Streptococcus C antigen
  • (1) Package Insert
  • (1) Quick Reference Instructions
  • QC Card (located on kit box)

Technical Specifications

  • Sample Type: Nasal swab, nasopharyngeal swab, nasopharyngeal aspirate/wash
  • Time of Results: Positive result in as few as 3 minutes, negative result 15 minutes (For Sophia 2)
  • Kit Storage Conditions: Room temperature (15°C to 30°C/59°F to 86°F)
  • Controls: Positive and negative
  • Nasal Swab Sensitivity: A: 90%, B: 89%
  • Nasopharyngeal Swab Sensitivity: A: 97%, B: 90%
  • Nasopharyngeal Aspirate/Wash Sensitivity: A: 99%, B: 88%
  • Nasal Swab Specificity: A: 95%, B: 96%
  • Nasopharyngeal Swab Specificity: A: 95%, B: 97%
  • Nasopharyngeal Aspirate/Wash Specificity: A: 96%, B: 96%
  • Shelf Life: 24 months from date of manufacture

Ships direct from manufacturer with is 7-10 business days.

Requires Physician's License

entry.title: ProAdvantage Urine Reagent Strips - 2 Parameter
entry.summary:
Vendor: Pro Advantage
Type: Urine Test Strips
Price: 15.99

(2 Parameter Test Strips) Tests for Glucose and Protein. These test strips allow you to detect signs of infection, urinary tract damage, kidney and liver disease, fat breakdown, diabetes, and more in about 1 minute. Results are obtained by direct comparison of the test strip with the color blocks printed on the bottle label. All test strips are packaged 100 per bottle.

entry.title: PRO ADVANTAGE® STREP A TEST
entry.summary:
Vendor: Pro Advantage
Type: Strep Test
Price: 40.25

A rapid test for the qualitative detection of Strep A antigen in throat swab specimens. Lateral flow immunoassay technology identifies antibodies specific for whole cell Lancefield Group A Streptococcus to selectively detect Strep A carbohydrate antigen in a throat swab specimen. Aids in the early diagnosis of Group A Streptococcal infection. 97% sensitivity; 95% specificity. Accurate results in 5 minutes. Quickly diagnose and treat infections to help avoid serious complications. CLIA Waived and FDA 510(k) cleared to market. Room temperature storage.

entry.title: Newman Medical ABI-400CL ABI Testing - with 4 Port Cuff Selector & 5 Cuffs
entry.summary:
Vendor: Newman Medical
Type: Vascular Doppler System
Price: 4495.50

Overview for the ABI-400CL ABI Testing - with 4 Port Cuff Selector & 5 Cuffs

The Automated ABI with Segmental & ABI Stress Testing Options are PC-based systems that were built with simplicity and ease of use in mind.

PAD Diagnosis. The system features an automated cuff selector and automatically calculates ABI (Ankle-Brachial Index) which aids in the detection of peripheral arterial disease (PAD). The diagnosis is made using the 'Gold Standard' 8MHz Doppler and simple Pulse Volume Recording (PVR) waveforms.

Compatibility and Comfortability. The Automated ABI with Segmental & ABI Stress Testing Options are user-friendly with a minimal learning curve. With a Point & Click reporting right on the computer, the system allows the user to have the diagnostic report either printed in any standard printer or saved in PDF or TIFF formats and be ready to be attached to EMR Patient records. The Cuff-Link Cuff Selector automatically inflates/deflates the cuff.

Personalized. The system software allows the user to create customized reports with practice information and logo.

The Automated ABI with Segmental & ABI Stress Testing Options comes with a 2 Year Warranty.
